text: The Hyundai Mufasa is a compact Crossover SUV made by Hyundai since 2023 through Beijing Hyundai which is a joint venture between Hyundai and BAIC. == History and Features == The Hyundai Mufasa was first previewed by a concept car named Mufasa Adventure on March 2023. the production version was launched in April at the Shanghai Auto Show and it was put on sale in June. the car has a 2.0 liter petrol engine with a 6-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == Currently the Hyundai Mufasa is sold only in China but in 2024 it was exported to Kazakhstan. == References == Mufasa Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Hyundai Mufasa
